# Supported Languages for Definition

| Languages     | Usage |
| ------------- | ----- |
| **English**   | en    |
| **Hindi**     | hi    |
| **Spanish**   | es    |
| **Japanese**  | ja    |
| **French**    | fr    |
| **Russian**   | ru    |
| **German**    | de    |
| **Italian**   | it    |
| **Korean**    | ko    |
| **Portugese** | pt    |
| **Arabic**    | ar    |
| **Turkish**   | tr    |
